snippet: A shooting sent terrified patrons scrambling from a Miami nightclub early Sunday and left 15 people wounded, including an 11-year-old child, authorities said....

headline.print_headline: Police: 15 Hurt in Miami Nightclub Shooting
headline.main: Police: 15 Hurt in Miami Nightclub Shooting

lead_paragraph: A shooting sent terrified patrons scrambling from a Miami nightclub early Sunday and left 15 people wounded, including an 11-year-old child, authorities said.
